articles.title: Kevin Costner will not return as John Dutton to 'Yellowstone' - 9News.com KUSA
articles.description: Kevin Costner has addressed his future on "Yellowstone" while doing press for his new Western movie "Horizon: An American Saga."
articles.content:
DENVER After a year and a half of speculation about his involvement, Kevin Costner has officially announced that he will not be returning to "Yellowstone."

articles.author: Hannah Sampson
articles.title: American Airlines CEO promises action after race discrimination lawsuit - The Washington Post
articles.description: The airline kicked eight Black men off a flight after a complaint over body odor, plaintiffs alleged. CEO Robert Isom called the incident “unacceptable.”
articles.content: American Airlines will take new measures including new training for staff, creating an advisory group and evaluating policies over removing people from flights after Black passengers filed a lawsuit … [+3263 chars]
